sentences.sContent: The genealogy of antignosticism is complex, but there is where the origins of totalitarianism are to be found.
sentences.sContent_eng: The genealogy of antignosticism is complex, but there is where the origins of totalitarianism are to be found.
sentences.sCn: 反灵知主义的谱系是复杂的，但是就是在这里我们能够找到极权主义的起源。

sentences.sContent: Every line of serious work that I have written since 1936 has been written, directly or indirectly, against totalitarianism and for democratic socialism, as I understand it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every line of serious work that I have written since 1936 has been written, directly or indirectly, against totalitarianism and for democratic socialism, as I understand it.
sentences.sCn: 1936年以来，我的严肃作品中的每一行都是为间接或直接地反对极权主义，拥护我所理解的民主社会主义而写的。

sentences.sContent: It is a force that I am sure will one day make totalitarianism impossible.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a force that I am sure will one day make totalitarianism impossible.
sentences.sCn: 它是一种强迫力，我相信有一天它会是极权主义成为不可能。

trans.tranOther: Totalitarianism is the ideas, principles, and practices of totalitarian political systems
